officialTitle: A Phase IIIb, Non-randomized, Open-label, Two-cohort Study in Patients With EGFR Mutations-positive Advanced Adenocarcinoma of the Lung, Assessing the Utility of the Afatinib Diarrhea Assessment and Management Guidelines (ADAM)
summary: This is a non-randomized, open label, two-cohort, multi-institutional study to evaluate the use of diarrheal management tools intended to facilitate timely intervention and treatment modifications due to afatinib treatment-related diarrhea in patients with EGFR mutations-positive adenocarcinoma of the lung. Patients in Cohort 1 will follow diarrhea management. Patients in Cohort 2 will receive prophylactic loperamide starting the fist day of afatinib treatment.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first drug administration until 28 days after the end of third treatment course, up to 84 days.
